page_content: The page is about a film project for school classes, focusing on various aspects of filmmaking.
The page discusses an event focused on digital transformation, including cybersecurity and digital competencies.
The page discusses various projects related to hydrometry, including the use of software for data collection and analysis.
The page discusses the extension of remote learning for secondary schools and financial support for businesses affected by COVID-19.
The page discusses the need for sufficient stopping places for itinerant people in the canton of Aargau.
The page discusses the First Responder system in the canton of Aargau, including guidelines and the use of Automated External Defibrillators (AEDs).
The page discusses the housing situation for asylum seekers in the canton of Aargau and the measures being taken to address it.
The page discusses a database that collects cases related to gender equality in the workplace, including wage discrimination and harassment.

The page provides information on eSteuerauszug, a feature that enhances the quality and transparency of the tax declaration process, and offers a PDF guide for importing bank data into EasyTax software.
The page provides information on vocational training and internships in the field of information technology, including the development, implementation, and maintenance of IT solutions.
